title: American_Top_40_1986_June_21st
description:
THIS FILE WAS PREVIOUSLY TORRENTED AS "American_Top_40_June_21st,_1986" IF YOU DOWNLOADED THAT FILE YOU ALREADY HAVE THIS ONE. THIS IS THE NEW TORRENT OF THAT SAME FILE AND THAT TORRENT WILL NO LONGER BE SEEDED. THIS IS ONE OF THE FIRST 15 I EVER TORRENTED. I'M JUST CHANGING THE NAME SO ALL SHOW TITLES ARE FORMATTED ALIKE.

"We're counting down the hottest hits in the nation on American Top 40. I'm Casey Kasem and the countdown continues."


American Top 40 with Casey Kasem aired on radio from July 4, 1970 until August 6, 1988. This rebroadcast is one of many I have recorded from internet radio. Some are incomplete but most are not and I hope you enjoy these as much as I do.
In this broadcast:

Casey answers the questions:

How many duos of siblings have hit number one?

Who was the first Australian recording act to ever hit number one on the American charts?

Did Moses part the Red Sea and is there a Bermuda Triangle? (No, really!)
